A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

Describe the problem or limitation this feature would address.

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case
Describe how this feature would be used in practice.
Example: "As a player, I would use this to..."

## Implementation Ideas
If you have technical ideas on how to implement this in MIPS assembly, share them here.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - Game is unusable without it
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve the experience
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor enhancement
